author: L-P-G
body:
With the pwsh binary not taking an -ArgumentList parameter it makes it pretty hard to call a PS script with parameters from another shell.

For example in Windows PS you can do:
"Powershell.exe -File Script.ps1" -ArgumentList "-Param1 Value -Param2 Value"

PWSH doesn't seem to support this, if it does can you please point me to the documentation that states how? because this doesn't display it:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.core/about/about_pwsh?view=powershell-7

comments.author: L-P-G
comments.body:
Nevermin, I'm stupid, simply doing works fine.

pwsh -File Script.ps1 -Param1 Value -Param2 Value

title: pwsh ArgumentList
